name: Riad Chouia Chouia

reviews.text: I am back from a five-night stay here. I arranged an airport transfer which was cheap and efficient. As a previous Reviewer noted Mohammed (Mumu) was there with a big smile to greet me at the street and escort me to the riad. The entrance is a bit funky off the street and a labrynth. But referenced from the Khatoubia entrance and the latterie, reasonably easy.
reviews.title: Fantastic service, great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were riad style, smaller but sufficient. Of course the building is old, but in good order with modern en-suite bathrooms. Beds were very good. Breakfast was good: Tasty and filling. The guys were happy to Steve it wherever I wanted, even up 4 stories to the roof.
reviews.title: Great location with great staff!

reviews.text: All in all a very good riad, with great service, and an excellent value in a great city.
reviews.title: The right price and the best place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ake issrebeh moulana, shukran, merci and thank you to Muhammed and Mamoud for a great stay! Your hospitality was great making our stay at your your riad enjoyable. You are the best.
reviews.title: Great place to stay, nice friendly staff... BUT

reviews.text: This is a great place to stay within the medina with access to many fun things to do and access to the many other places in Marrakech.
reviews.title: Great service and great location

description: The Quartier El Ksour is an area full of secret palaces. Riad Chouia Chouia is an exceptional house. Cool off in the swimming pool which is situated in the courtyard patio. Within 2 minutes from Jemmaa el fna square. Price range: 35 to 100 euros.
